channel.title: Someone put lava in my house
channel.description:
so i logged in with a old client and BAM lava in my house right where i come so lost 5 diamonts and lot's of iron
also all my chest are gone i had fucking much recources
this sucks

item.title: Someone put lava in my house

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The problem is fixed.

item.title: Someone put lava in my house
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:4, topic:379224”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=475072.msg3474047#msg3474047 date=1295540347]
Hmm there seems to be a problem with chests? They shouldn’t be going away like that.
[/quote]i know how they do it
ill pm u a video exploiting it[/quote]

Pm me I wanna see so(I’m not griever just wanna know how he did to my place in varrock)
